00027   #ifdef ARMA_USE_BOOST
00028     using boost::format;

00032     
00033     class format
00034       {
00035       public:
00036     
00037       format(const char* in_fmt)
00038         : A(in_fmt)
00039         {
00040         }
00041     
00042       format(const std::string& in_fmt)
00043         : A(in_fmt)
00044         {
00045         }
00046     
00047     
00048       const std::string A;
00049     
00050       private:
00051       format();
00052       };
00053     
00054     
00055     
00056     template<typename T1, typename T2>
00057     class basic_format
00058       {
00059       public:
00060     
00061       basic_format(const T1& in_A, const T2& in_B)
00062         : A(in_A)
00063         , B(in_B)
00064         {
00065         }
00066     
00067       const T1& A;
00068       const T2& B;
00069     
00070       private:
00071       basic_format();
00072       };
00073     
00074     
00075     
00076     template<typename T2>
00077     inline
00078     basic_format< format, T2 >
00079     operator% (const format& X, const T2& arg)
00080       {
00081       return basic_format< format, T2 >(X, arg);
00082       }
00083     
00084     
00085     
00086     template<typename T1, typename T2, typename T3>
00087     inline
00088     basic_format< basic_format<T1,T2>, T3 >
00089     operator% (const basic_format<T1,T2>& X, const T3& arg)
00090       {
00091       return basic_format< basic_format<T1,T2>, T3 >(X, arg);
00092       }

00095     
00096     template<typename T2>
00097     inline
00098     std::string
00099     str(const basic_format< format, T2>& X)
00100       {
00101       int data_size = 1024;
00102       int reqd_size = data_size;
00103     
00104       std::string out;
00105     
00106       do
00107         {
00108         char* data = new char[data_size];
00109         reqd_size = snprintf(data, data_size, X.A.A.c_str(), X.B);
00110     
00111         if(reqd_size < 0)
00112           break;
00113     
00114         if(reqd_size < data_size)
00115           out = data;
00116         else
00117           data_size *= 2;
00118     
00119         delete[] data;
00120     
00121         } while(reqd_size >= data_size);
00122     
00123       return out;
00124       }
00125     
00126

00287     
00288     template<typename T1>
00289     struct format_metaprog
00290       {
00291       static const u32 depth = 0;
00292     
00293       inline
00294       static  
00295       const std::string&
00296       get_fmt(const T1& X)
00297         {
00298         return X.A;
00299         }
00300       };
00301     
00302     
00303     
00304     template<>
00305     template<typename T1, typename T2>
00306     struct format_metaprog< basic_format<T1,T2> >
00307       {
00308       static const u32 depth = 1 + format_metaprog<T1>::depth;
00309     
00310       inline
00311       static
00312       const std::string&
00313       get_fmt(const T1& X)
00314         {
00315         return format_metaprog<T1>::get_fmt(X.A);
00316         }
00317     
00318       };
00319     
00320     
00321     
00322     template<typename T1, typename T2>
00323     inline
00324     std::string
00325     str(const basic_format<T1,T2>& X)
00326       {
00327       return format_metaprog< basic_format<T1,T2> >::get_fmt(X.A);
00328       }
00329     
00330     
00331     
00332     template<typename T1, typename T2>
00333     inline
00334     std::ostream&
00335     operator<< (std::ostream& o, const basic_format<T1,T2>& X)
00336       {
00337       o << str(X);
00338       return o;
00339       }
